name: Beautiful.ai
tagline: AI-powered presentation software that designs for you
targetAudience: Business professionals, marketing teams, educators — anyone who needs polished decks without design skills
differentiators: Design-first approach — the AI focuses on layout and visual design rather than just content generation. Smart Slides automatically adjust formatting as you add content.

name: Gamma
tagline: A new medium for presenting ideas, powered by AI
targetAudience: Startups, content creators, educators, and professionals who want modern, web-native presentations
weaknesses: Not traditional slide format — can't export to PowerPoint natively
Less suited for formal corporate presentations
differentiators: Web-native presentation format that goes beyond traditional slides. Content is interactive, scrollable, and embeddable — more like a modern document than a deck.

name: Tome
targetAudience: Knowledge workers, startups, creative professionals who want narrative-driven presentations
strengths: Good for internal docs and memos
weaknesses: Pivoted away from presentations toward general documents
Less structured for formal business decks
differentiators: Narrative-first approach — generates story-driven content rather than bullet-point slides. Strong integration with generative AI for both text and images.

name: Plus AI
tagline: AI presentation maker for Google Slides and PowerPoint
targetAudience: Business professionals and teams who work in Google Slides or PowerPoint and want AI augmentation
strengths: Works inside existing tools (Google Slides + PowerPoint)
differentiators: Native integration into Google Slides and PowerPoint — works within the tools people already use rather than requiring a new platform. Can generate from uploaded documents.

name: Decktopus
tagline: AI-powered presentation tool that creates stunning decks in seconds
targetAudience: Small businesses, freelancers, educators, and sales teams who need quick presentations with engagement features
differentiators: Audience interaction and engagement tools built directly into presentations — polls, Q&A, forms, and custom domains make it a presentation + lead-gen hybrid.

name: SlidesAI
tagline: Create professional presentations in seconds with AI
targetAudience: Budget-conscious professionals, students, educators who want affordable AI presentation generation
differentiators: Lowest cost entry point for AI presentations. Massive distribution through Google Workspace marketplace (15M+ downloads).

name: Slidebean
tagline: The pitch deck experts — design, content, and strategy for fundraising
targetAudience: Startups and founders raising capital — specifically focused on pitch decks for fundraising
strengths: Deep pitch deck expertise ($500M+ raised with their decks)
differentiators: Uniquely positioned as pitch deck specialists rather than general presentation tool. Combines AI software with human design services and startup advisory.
